devdoc.author: Bob Remeika

check(address,address,address,uint256).details: This method calls back to the token contract specified by `_token` for        information needed to enforce trade approval if needed

params._amount: The quantity of the token to trade
params._from: The address of the sender account
params._to: The address of the receiver account
params._token: The address of the token to be transfered

check(address,address,address,uint256).return: `true` if the trade should be approved and `false` if the trade should not be approved

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setLocked(address,bool).details: This method can only be called by this contract's owner

params._token: The address of the token to lock

setPartialTransfers(address,bool).details: This method can only be called by this contract's owner

params._token: The address of the token to allow partial transfers

setPermission(address,address,uint8).details: The `_permission` bits overwrite the previous trade permissions and can        only be called by the contract's owner.  `_permissions` can be bitwise        `|`'d together to allow for more than one permission bit to be set.

params._participant: The address of the trade participant

transferAdmin(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer admin controls to newAdmin.

params.newAdmin: The address to transfer admin rights to.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: On-chain RegulatorService implementation for approving trades

check(address,address,address,uint256).notice: Checks whether or not a trade should be approved

setLocked(address,bool).notice: Locks the ability to trade a token

setPartialTransfers(address,bool).notice: Allows the ability to trade a fraction of a token

setPermission(address,address,uint8).notice: Sets the trade permissions for a participant on a token
